title: Someone Should Have Told Me
author: Andrew
description: Frankie Blake follows rules EXACTLY. So when he's put in charge of his little brother for a week, and a stray cat shows up, and the cat maybe eats all the snacks, and maybe has kittens in the closetâ€”none of that is his fault. He has documentation.

chapters.title: A Cat Is Not a Friend
An Emergency Is When Someone Is Dying
Returning Is Not the Same as Getting Rid Of
